proof_script:
lemma mat_adj_inv: assumes "mat_det M \<noteq> 0" shows "mat_adj (mat_inv M) = mat_inv (mat_adj M)"
using assms mat_det_inv[of M]
by (cases M) (simp_all add: divide_simps mat_adj_def mat_cnj_def)

agent_info.successful_proof:
lemma mat_adj_inv: assumes "mat_det M \<noteq> 0" shows "mat_adj (mat_inv M) = mat_inv (mat_adj M)"
using assms mat_det_inv[of M]
by (cases M) (simp_all add: divide_simps mat_adj_def mat_cnj_def)
